entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:50 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -34.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 05:14 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -34.3°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -37.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
